metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10094 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Off-by-one error in the t2p_readwrite_pdf_image_tile function intools/tiff2pdf.c in LibTIFF 4.0.7 allows remote attackers to haveunspecified impact via a crafted image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10094` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
